alert.note: Alert for Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 4:09PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm with torrential rainfall will impact portions of southwestern Prowers, north central Baca and southeastern Bent Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 408 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles west of Two Buttes Reservoir, or 18 miles northwest of Springfield, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Two Buttes Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
